title: Immunocologie has released a $40 version of it's best-selling $105 vital mask
text:
Immunocologie's Vital Clay Mask has long been a favorite of beauty editors and bloggers thanks to its soothing blend of purifying minerals that leaves skin hydrated and glowing.

So much so that after launching in 2016 the face mask repeatedly sold out, and at one point notched up a waiting list of more than 3,000 people.

Now the mineral and plant-based brand has launched a multitasking $40 version of the mask, making their luxury skincare more affordable - and you can currently get an extra 20 per cent off with the code DAILY20.

The Vital Clay Spot Treatment is a $40 version of Immunocologie's best-selling vital clay mask, featuring the same formulation of three rare clays and 12 essential minerals but in a 15ml pot

The Vital Clay Spot Blemish Treatment features the same formulation as the Vital Clay Mask but in a 15ml size pot.

This makes it ideal for anyone who wants to try the product before investing in the 100ml mask, those who need a travel version, or customers who want to use the clay as a spot treatment targeting specific areas.

To use as a mask, apply it in a thin layer over your face, neck and décolleté, before leaving to dry for a few minutes. It should then be removed with a damp cloth or warm water, and your skin will be refreshed and renewed.

The 15ml size is ideal for anyone who wants to try the clay before investing in the 100ml mask, those who need a travel version, or customers who want a spot treatment for blemishes

The spot treatment can be used in the same way, or over smaller areas where blemishes or inflammation have occurred.

Immunocologie's founder Karen Ballou points out that the beauty of the green clay is that it is a multitasker and can be used for a variety of skincare complaints and on all skin types.

'It takes the skin into a whole new rejuvenation aspect that you don't feel from most masks,' she tells DailyMail.com. 'It helps with blemishes, helps extract impurities, helps to restore the skin, helps to hydrate the skin, and helps to even out skin tone as it refreshes the skin.'

IMMUNOCOLOGIE'S ESSENTIALS The skincare brand is now offering three of their best-selling products in convenient 10ml travel sizes. The Essentials set, which costs $110 for three products, allows you to sample the Cleansing and Exfoliating Lotions as well as the Super 7 Elixir. The two lotions work together to gently cleanse, detox and exfoliate the skin, while Super 7 Elixir nourishes and provides essential vitamins and minerals to keep your skin glowing.

The key to the mask's success lies in the 12 essential minerals from green clay water that are infused into the mask. Plant-based ingredients are then also infused into the clay to create the mask.

'Green clay is known to be an anti-inflammatory and healing agent for the skin,' says Karen. 'And aging is all about inflammation.

'Thirteen years ago I started using the clay and beginning to understand its molecular structure, and I discovered it benefits in so many different capacities.'

Mother-of-four Karen was diagnosed with Hodgkin’s lymphoma eleven years ago, and she says that as a cancer survivor she became increasingly concerned with using ingredients that were natural, organic and healing for the skin.

After going into remission six years ago, Karen combined her experience of more than 30 years in the beauty industry with her desire to create the clean, healthy skincare that is found throughout the Immunocologie brand.

She says: 'One of the things I decided after going through chemotherapy is that I needed to find a way to work with my skin. The clay is not only natural, but it actually delivers results.'

All the ingredients used in Immunocologie products are natural, organic and sustainably sourced to naturally reduce the signs of aging, such as skin inflammation, redness, wrinkles and fine lines, as it hydrates giving the skin a healthy glow.

Karen adds: 'I wanted to bring to the market a product that would make a difference on everyone's skin - women and men, young and old - that really works, and to provide ingredients that are healthy for the skin and the body.'
